name: plansewalker-primer-scripts
description: Data scraping scripts for Planeswalker's Primer MTG data

scripts.scrape:fundamentals: npm run scrape:overview && npm run scrape:colors && npm run scrape:card-types && npm run scrape:turn-phases && npm run scrape:anatomy && npm run scrape:win-conditions && npm run scrape:deck-building && npm run scrape:combat
scripts.scrape:all: npm run scrape:fundamentals && npm run scrape:mechanics && npm run scrape:game-modes
scripts.build: npm run scrape:all && npm run copy
